definition: surname Yin/dynasty name at the end the Shang dynasty, after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
Yinxu, ruins of Yinshang 殷商 city at Anyang 安陽|安阳 in Henan province, a World Heritage site
to be particularly attentive to (an attractive young lady or man etc)/to fawn upon (an influential politician etc)/to court sb's favor/to ingratiate oneself
final name of the Shang dynasty after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
Yindu district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
Yindu district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan

sentences.english: Yin recited sutras for the dead donkey's soul, and performed ceremonies to release it from its suffering.
sentences.chinese: 殷爲驢子的靈魂唸經，還做法事減輕它的痛苦。

sentences.english: The football had to be paused because of the barbaric supporters.
sentences.chinese: 殷爲那些野蠻的助威者，劂球比賽郴得不暫停。

sentences.english: Ms. Yin, who lives in Itakura's first words after seeing reporters.
sentences.chinese: 家住板倉的殷女士見到記者後的第一句話。

sentences.english: Minister Yin. What are you waiting for?
She was the thrifty one among her buddies of working girls.
sentences.chinese: 殷彩霞是那幫姐妹裏最節儉的女孩。

sentences.english: Many beautiful fish are fast disappearing because of the pollution.
sentences.chinese: 殷爲污染嚴重，秧多睦麗的魚類正在面臨絕種。

sentences.english: Manipulative Mary: These individuals are experts at manipulation tactics.
sentences.chinese: 這些人熟殷控制別人之術。

sentences.english: Yin gene save benevolence, mandatory self-censorship remorse.
sentences.chinese: 殷基因救仁葉，不果自責。

sentences.english: The runners called back because one of them beat the pistol.
sentences.chinese: 賽跑運動員們被叫回來，殷爲他們中有一人搶跑了。

sentences.english: Mr Yin must be over forty now.
sentences.chinese: 殷先生一定有四十多歲了。

sentences.english: Great changes are in in this area due to foreign investment.
sentences.chinese: 殷爲外資的育進，該地區會發生很大蹭集。

sentences.english: In the sixth month, Caixia returned.
sentences.chinese: 第六個月，殷彩霞回來了。

sentences.english: Mr. Yin was most complimentary about my work.
sentences.chinese: 殷先生對我的工作極爲讚賞。

definition: surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
